name: Shinkai: json-to-md
description: Converts JSON to Markdown using a Nunjucks (Jinja2-like) template
author: Shinkai

only_system.description: If true, only system templates will be used

message.description: The JSON data to convert to Markdown

template.description: The Nunjucks template to use for conversion

message.description: The resulting Markdown text after template processing
